title: Development of an Integrated Tourism Development Project at Dedduwa
decision_details: - It has been planned to develop the Dedduwa area as a tourist destination through public and private partnership. Accordingly, the joint proposal made by the Ministers of Tourism Development, Wildlife and Christian Religious Affairs, Lands and Parliamentary Reforms and Ports & Shipping and Southern Development, to obtain the services of a local or international consultancy agency with experience in transaction advisory services for large scale projects and the preparation of Expression of Interest and to call for Expression of Interest and Business proposals from the interested parties in this project, considering the large scale of the proposed development project, was approved by the Cabinet.
